query:
WITH entities AS (
               SELECT ap.id FROM core_accounting_periods ap
               WHERE ap.chart_id = $1 AND ap.closed_at IS NULL) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $2 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_accounting_period_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id, e.sequence
